progressNotes.note: Initial interview completed. She is already skilled at AI prompting and uses it as a logic partner. Main blockers are tool access and policy clarity, not training.

designers.keyInsight: Already skilled at AI prompting - needs tools set up, policies clarified, and workflows built for her constrained context, not training on how to use AI

designers.name: GG

figmaAI.notes: Excited for when available - sees it as game changer for token naming, spell checking, consistency

claude.notes: Starting to explore for digital design systems, prefers over Gemini

chatgpt.notes: Uses extensively as advisor/conversation partner, not for solutions

painPoints.details: Time spent creating detailed prompts often equals time to figure it out himself

painPoints.issue: AI outputs are generic without detailed prompts
painPoints.details: All AI apps provide same outputs based on same alignment unless very informative from start
Worried about using company design system data with external AI - wants written approval from Michael

painPoints.issue: No clear roadmap for AI adoption
painPoints.details: Needs organized steps and strategy, not ad-hoc exploration

progressNotes.note: Initial discussion. Very enthusiastic about digital design systems direction. Uses AI extensively as advisor/conversation partner rather than for solutions. Willing to contribute as much as needed but currently focused on Mumbai work through current PI. Will be more available after this PI. Concerned about security - wants written approval before using design system data with Claude.

designers.keyInsight: Experienced AI user who sees it as advisor not solution-giver. Excited about digital design system vision but needs clear roadmap, security approval, and time allocation after current PI
